entry.description: Extend wishlist in customerData, add product ids for all items from wishlist. Add selected class for towishlist element for all product tiles and wishlist icons on PDP that are on wishlist. Move tile ajax add-to-wishlist functionality from magesuite-priduct-tile-module. Add ajax add to wishlist functionality for PDP wishlist icon.

entry.overview: Add wishlist script to cms and cart pages. Handle the scenario when icon is missing
entry.description: Initialize add-to-wishlist script for cms pages and cart page. For category, search results and PDP this script is already initialized by Magento. Handle the scenario where icon/image inside wishlist add-to trigger is missing.
